mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO [dbo].[discounts] (identifier, cart_id, name, description, amount, amount_type, discount_id, discount_type, coupon_code, algorithm, apply_to_recurring_billing, origin, created_by, created_dt, modified_by, modified_dt) VALUES
(#{item.identifier}, #{item.cartId}, #{item.name}, #{item.description}, #{item.amount}, #{item.amountType}, #{item.discountId}, #{item.discountType}, #{item.couponCode}, #{item.algorithm}, #{item.applyToRecurringBilling}, #{item.origin}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdDt}, #{item.modifiedBy}, #{item.modifiedDt} )
mapper.select: SELECT identifier, cart_id as cartId, name, description, amount, amount_type as amountType, discount_id as discountId, discount_type as discountType, coupon_code as couponCode, algorithm, apply_to_recurring_billing as applyToRecurringBilling, origin, created_by as createdBy, created_dt as createdDt, modified_by as modifiedBy, modified_dt as modifieddt FROM dbo.discounts WHERE discount_type = #{discountType} AND discount_id = #{discountId}
